description:
Chad is another kid who I think looks a little military to me, though I think he grew up kind of rough, bouncing from place to place, without a lot of stability. He brought out the Daddy in me for sure.
He's got a hot little body on him and was a joy to work with - maybe a little quiet, but good at showing off his cock and playing to the audience.
He likes girls with big asses, and we had a video of a girl getting her ass all oiled-up that had him REALLY worked up.
There is an outtake at the very end and explains his somewhat less than copious cumshot.
He's a good kid. Very straight and worried about his friends finding out he is doing a solo, though his family seems fine with it.
Wouldn't mind sucking on his dick to see if we could push his limits. Not sure he can be convinced, though the money was sounding pretty good to him!
title: Chad - Solo
